description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'ConfigStore' responsible for persisting and retrieving application configuration data using Android's SharedPreferences. It provides methods to save an AppConfig object to preferences and load it back, managing configuration for WebSocket and MQTT connections.

classes.name: ConfigStore
classes.description: Class responsible for storing and loading app configuration using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the provided AppConfig instance into SharedPreferences.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the AppConfig instance from SharedPreferences.
